front.title: The BLAKE2 Cryptographic Hash and MAC

abstract.t: This document describes the cryptographic hash function BLAKE2, making the algorithm specification and C source code conveniently available to the Internet community. BLAKE2 comes in two main flavors: BLAKE2b is optimized for 64-bit platforms, and BLAKE2s for smaller architectures. BLAKE2 can be directly keyed, making it functionally equivalent to a Message Authentication Code (MAC).
